Lat.Long.Notes: Lossi Animal Sanctuary centroid used as excel coords. A 70km radius needs to be drawn around the excel coords to include Mendemba (Mindemba in GE). See Fig 1 for detailed digitizing
Outbreak.Notes: No faecal, blood or other soft tissue samples were obtained owing to delays in acquiring the information, which ranged from a week to 1 or more years, but in some instances it was possible to collect long bones and skulls that were tested at the NICD by RT-PCR for the presence of Ebola virus nucleic acid. Only diagnosis of Ebola haemorrhagic fever con_rmed in a laboratory were reported here. Info taken from Table 2

Outbreak.Notes: No faecal, blood or other soft tissue samples were obtained owing to delays in acquiring the information, which ranged from a week to 1 or more years, but in some instances it was possible to collect long bones and skulls that were tested at the NICD by RT-PCR for the presence of Ebola virus nucleic acid. Only diagnosis of Ebola haemorrhagic fever con_rmed in a laboratory were reported here. Info taken from Table 2. Furthermore the paper states that in January 1996 the second EHF epidemic in Gabon occured in Mayiboth 2 village on the east bank of the Ivindo river, when villagers butchered and consumed an infected chimp carcass (Georges 1999).
